import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./header.css"; const Header = () => { const [isDropdownOpen, setIsDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); const tenDangNhap = localStorage.getItem("ten_dang_nhap") || "User"; const role = localStorage.getItem("role"); // 'admin' hoặc 'user' const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("token"); localStorage.removeItem("ten_dang_nhap"); localStorage.removeItem("role"); window.location.href = "/"; }; return (
